titles.title: Thomas P. O'Hara Public Land Career Opportunity Act of 2006
A bill to provide competitive status to certain Federal employees in the State of Alaska.
Thomas P. O'Hara Public Land Career Opportunity Act of 2006

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: Thomas P. O'Hara Public Land Career Opportunity Act of 2006 - Amends the Alaska National Interest Lands Conservation Act to provide competitive status to certain permanent federal employees in Alaska after: (1) if the appointment is full-time, the completion of two years of competitive and satisfactory full time service; or (2) if the appointment is less than full time, the period that is equivalent to two years of competitive and satisfactory full time service.
